text:
What a nice neighbourhood centre!!
With Sheng Siong, daiso, food court and little water play area. Lots of nice food.

A very nice and convenient neighborhood shopping mall for all.  Clothing alteration/ laundry services available at OUMI located at #01-15. Very friendly boss, Cynthia, and her experienced staff. Greatly Recommended!
Good parking space, we visit for Sheng Siong which has good grocery variety and low prices. Quite a few food & drink shops which is convenient.

Ordered a Truffle Beef Bacon & Mushroom Carbonara but they ran out of truffle oil and did not make any effort to give a discount even when requested. Not very customer oriented and doesn’t say much for their operations when they can’t even stock a key ingredient for the dish.

Mall with spacious walking space and not crowded on weekdays. Though the mall has been in operation for quite some time, there is still space under renovation on 2nd Floor.
Parking charges similar to HDB parking charges. Sheng Siong is the big tenants. Small playground and outdoor sitting provided.
